dstm2.factory.ofree

Class ReadSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<Transaction>
        • dstm2.factory.ofree.ReadSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Transaction>, java.util.Collection<Transaction>, java.util.Set<Transaction>

    public class ReadSet
extends java.util.AbstractSet<Transaction>
    ReadSet.java Keep track of transactions that opened this object for READ.
